custom-sql.sql: SELECT myNode.facilityId, myNode.parentId, myNode.name, myNode.typ, myNode.www, myNode.level, myNode.sort, IF(myParent.facilityId>=0, IF(myGrandparent.facilityId>=0, CONCAT(myGrandparent.facilityId, '/', myParent.facilityId, '/', myNode.facilityId), CONCAT('', myParent.facilityId, '/', myNode.facilityId)), CONCAT( myNode.facilityId, '')) AS path FROM lg_facility AS myNode LEFT JOIN lg_facility AS myParent ON myNode.parentId = myParent.facilityId LEFT JOIN lg_facility AS myGrandparent ON myParent.parentId = myGrandparent.facilityId ORDER BY path ASC

SELECT lg_facility.facilityId, lg_facility.parentId, lg_facility.name, lg_facility.typ, lg_facility.www, lg_facility.level, lg_facility.sort FROM lg_facility, lg_lectureseries_facility WHERE (lg_lectureseries_facility.lectureseriesId=? AND lg_facility.facilityId=lg_lectureseries_facility.facilityId)
SELECT semesterName FROM lg_lectureseries WHERE semesterName!='' GROUP BY semesterName
SELECT p.producerId FROM lg_producer_lectureseries AS pc INNER JOIN lg_producer AS p ON pc.producerId = p.producerId WHERE pc.lectureseriesId = ?
UPDATE lg_video SET lectureseriesId=0 WHERE lectureseriesId=?
